duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and process specimens according to department protocols.
Design and update procedures to promote maximum efficiency/accuracy of testing and reporting.
Assist with administrative functions such as ordering supplies and maintaining inventory.
Adhere to lab procedures and safety precautions.
Produce, interpret, and report accurate and precise test results.
Identify and correct problems affecting test performance or result reporting.
Communicate pertinent section information/issues to supervisor or manager.
Perform instrument maintenance and method troubleshooting.
Assist in documentation and maintaining effective department QA/QC programs.
Comply with Corporate Compliance Program, Privacy, and Security policies.
Perform within the productivity expectations as set forth by current departmental guidelines.
Work with other departments within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a chemical, physical, biological, or clinical lab science or medical technology.
